寴字的基本解释

寴
qīn
古同“亲”，亲密无间。

寴
qìn
屋内空空。

寴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīn］
［《廣韻》七人切，平真，清。］
同“親1”。
[②]［qìn］
［《廣韻》七遴切，去震，清。］
屋空貌。

寴字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寴； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页293第06
【集韻】親古作寴。註詳見部九畫。【秦石刻文】寴䡅遠方。徐敦?音親巡。亦作亲。　又【廣韻】七遴切【集韻】【類篇】七刃切，?音瀙。【說文】至也。【廣韻】屋空貌。

寴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
寴字的起名意思

暂无。

寴
Basic explanation of words
寴
qīn
Gu is "close" and intimate.
寴
qìn
The room was empty.
寴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qīn］
["Guangyun" seven people cut, plain and clear. ]
Same as "pro 1".
[②]［qìn］
["Guangyun" Seven Lining, Quzhen, Qing. ]
The house is empty.
寴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first part of Yinji】【The Department of the Characters of the Luo】　寴; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 293 06
[Ji Yun] Pro-Gu Zuo Lao. Note for details, see Part Nine Paintings. 【Qin Shi Inscriptions】Look far away. Xu Dun? Sound pro-tour. Also as a pro.　 [Guang Yun] Seven Lin Qi [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] Seven blade cutting,? Yin Huang. [Said the text] to the point. [Guang Yun] The house is empty.
